Nodes.NPCDialogue: Fuck you, and fuck your faith.
I hope there will be enough of you to bury...
You're delusional, boy.
Cheeky, I like it.
I bet the horse would pay me good money to bury you all.
*chad energy* Yes.
Can't enjoy business if you're dead.
Grave diggers don't have to make sense, fuck off.
Horde's coin is as good as yours.
Now you speak my language, boy.
Living are of no concern to me. Dead are just clients.
The day grave diggers pick up swords, is the day we all die unburied.
What a load of shite.
...speak.
We will also need to bury a lot of you...
Aye, it will, as long as it's double what I take for burials. Hazard pay you know. **spits**
I said what I said, laddy, take it or leave it.
I ain't paid to swing my shovel to kill folk, just to bury them.
I'm an old man with a shovel. What the fuck can I do?
Aye, shite. I guess I'll join you, to protect my business, you know...
I trust my silver tongue more than your doom-saying. Begone.
Exactly, like usual. Y'all will need to be buried...
Over my dead body.
You're pathetic.
What a load of wank.
You son of a bitch! FINE.
**narrows eyes** what are you saying, BOY?
You're welcome laddy, what do you want?
The only place I'll be helping you to get to, is the grave.
Fuck me... I guess I have to join you.
They really do that??
Heavens above! Fine, I'll join you, you psychopath!
**gurgles on his own blood as the light fades from his eyes**
Does it make you HARD to threaten an old man??
What kind of animal kills a gravedigger?
Aye, they do, but I doubt you'll have an open lid funeral...
Good point, I suppose I'll help...
...I suppose. Count me in then, but don't make me regret it, boy.
Big words for little pisspot who supposedly needs my help. I hope horde pisses on your corpse.
Colorful, you grim little fucker. But I ain't convinced.
Are you sure you can afford me?
**grins** Burn in hell, lad. Your corpse will be warm as the demons sodomize you.
**scowls** FINE, you made your point. Let no imbred fuck in this shithole say I am not generous or courageous.
Aye, you said that already. Stop repeating yourself like a brad with brain damage.
...I like thanks. **grumbles** Fine. I shall assist you!
So you say, but I fail to see how that concerns me!
**falls on the ground, bleeding and missing half the teeth, cracked orbital making his temple bleed and eye flow out of his broken eyesocket**
**laughs heartily** Such mouth on you lad. But FINE, I shall help you solely to prove you that Old Theodoric has a heart of gold under all that cemetery dirt.
Let's not get hasty boy. I was just jerking your chain!
**brick hits grave digger on the head. His head cracks and he falls on the ground dead**
And that kind of language will cost you extra, too.
Fag.
Fag.
Fag.
**whistles** Are you hitting on me, boy?
Are you getting philosophical on me? That's gonna cost you extra (50 gold).
You look the correct size for a coffin.

Edges.PlayerDialogue: The horde is coming, I will need your help...
Well... we will need trenches dug.
Well then I guess I'll die delusional!
Then you have nothing to lose by helping us.
Think of how much business you'll have with all the corpses around...
Then you better work so we win.
Is money all you really care about?!
You're not an old man yet, and I bet you could a swing a sword as well as that shovel...
No matter what we do, there's gonna be a lot of bodies to bury or not.
Then ensure you have business to run after this.
I bet horde raiders have lots of coin on them... How about we make as many of them into corpses?
Think of honor! Think of GLORY!
I'm not sure if that makes sense... ?
Fine, I'll PAY you for every fucker you kill! Will that get you on board?
How do you imagine your business will continue, once the horde gets here?
Horde don't bury their dead, or any other dead. Sky funerals...
Unless the horde will kill you, and leave you to rot, like the REST of us.
Can I get a discount on a coffin? One sized roughly, like you...
I will kill you, if you will not help us.
That the horde will kill you, if you do not help us!
I will save the horde the trouble of killing you, if you don't grab a sword.
Are the coffin lids included in the price?
I might... if you help me.
Same can be said of you, if you don't help.
Me **put hand on pommel of your sword**
**unsheathe your sword** Say your prayers old man.
**draw your sword, and run him through the neck**
Aren't ALL people correct size for a coffin?
Oooh, you greedy old fuck **clench your fists**
Fine, I'll pay you whatever you want, but you need to help us save this village.
It's my gold, or horde's steel. Pick your poison, old man.
No, but with me you'll have SOME gold, with horde, you'll be clutching your entrails so that they don't spill from your body!
By the time your guts are spilling under your body it will be to late to change your mind.
**turns around ready to leave** You just lost yourself a customer.
**returns back to the grave digger** You sick old fuck, lives are at stake!
It will once horde raiders gut you like a fish, you stubborn fool.
You are reprehensible scum. Your death with be a mercy to this town.
**sighs** Stop bickering like old fishwoman then and grab a sword, your help will be compensated financially.
If it doesn't, then you shall die alone as well as thankless.
**slams fist into grave digger's face** You sick old fuck! I deserve to perish!
**laughs mirthlessly** Oh thine sense of humor is flawless as it thine timing, you swine.
No. I need you for the war effort. Stop being difficult, grab a sword and stop standing around with that shovel like a stiff cock.
